ABOUT

A QUICK SUMMARY

I'm an aspiring front end developer with a passion for learning web development and design.

All of my work is fully responsive and I have experience working with HTML, CSS, Javascript and frameworks including Bootstrap and jQuery.

To make my development more time efficient I use tools such as SCSS, GULP and NPM.

I also have experience with Git and have used it to store code from my projects on GitHub.
